GSD.description:
virtio_console: eliminate anonymous module_init & module_exit

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.311 by commit 93e3d88321d2274fa4e26b006e19cc10fec331c2. For more details please see the references link.
